messages.subject: Re: Re: Mr. Bean/Kyle C
messages.msgSnippet: ****Rowan Atkinson, who does Mr. Bean, is the only actor I can think of who does mime AND just voicework (he was Zazu (sp?) the bird who advises Simba on Lion
messages.messageBody:
****Rowan Atkinson, who does Mr. Bean, is the only actor I can think of
who does
mime AND just voicework (he was Zazu (sp?) the bird who advises Simba on
Lion
King). My favorite of all his stuff is Black Adder. Especially the
Elizabethan series. ****


Very doable in the Elizabethan role - beard and all - yummy. Kind of
reminds me of my husband.

I happen to find Rowan Atkinson very smart and sexy.

Kate
who is off to find her husband now that I've started thinking of him as
looking (and acting) like Rowan Atkinson
